definition: slab/(geology) tectonic plate/(fig.) sector (of the stock market or of industry)/(economic) bloc
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

sentences.english: Oops. They were one of the best-performing sectors in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 但銀行股卻是2012年表現最佳的板塊之一。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the rotation of the earth is another factor responsible for earth plate motion.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，自轉的影響也是使板塊運動的力源。

sentences.english: Characteristics and correlation of fluctuating pressure in instability area were specially analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 重點分析了失穩區底板塊動水壓力特性及相關特性。

sentences.english: But Shenzhen Stock Cheng Zhi, because is implicated the bank tectonic plate is small, bounce dynamics is slightly big.
sentences.chinese: 而深證成指由於受銀行板塊拖累較小，反彈力度稍大。

sentences.english: When the plates move, the continents move with them.
sentences.chinese: 當板塊移動的時候，陸地也會跟着移動。

sentences.english: They occurred under the tectonic setting ranging from post collision uplift to late orogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 產生於板塊碰撞後隆起到造山晚期的構造背景。

sentences.english: Square slabs were cut from cubes cast with various aggregate sizes .
sentences.chinese: 從具有不同骨料粒度的立方澆注塊中切出方形板塊。

sentences.english: Mining stocks, which are especially sensitive to economic growth prospects led the gains.
sentences.chinese: 對各國經濟增長預期業尤爲敏感的礦業板塊漲幅居前。

sentences.english: The wiring inside the individual sections is effected with flexible PVC wires.
sentences.chinese: 單個板塊內部的配線是通過靈活的PVC線進行執行。

sentences.english: Nations cannot act and stand alone when tectonic plates are shifting.
sentences.chinese: 地質板塊正在漂移，國家再也不可能獨自行動。

sentences.english: Bingdaban fault is boundary, each other belong to hyperplasia belt of two plates.
sentences.chinese: 以冰達坂斷裂爲分界線，分別屬於兩大板塊的增生帶。

sentences.english: The plate activity in Tianshan can be traced back to Middle and Late proterozoic.
sentences.chinese: 天山地區的板塊活動可以追溯到中晚元古代。

sentences.english: The Sunda Plate noses into the curve, and tilts India.
sentences.chinese: 巽他板塊插入了曲線並使得印度傾斜。

sentences.english: The theory of plate tectonics is the division of palaeo-plates.
sentences.chinese: 板塊構造理論是古板塊分區的基礎。

sentences.english: The theory of plate tectonics is the division of palaeo-plates.
sentences.chinese: 板塊構造理論是古板塊分區的基礎。

sentences.english: Each year, the plates move about an inch farther apart.
sentences.chinese: 這兩大板塊每年都會遠離一英寸。

definition: faucet/water tap/bicycle handle bar/chief (esp. of gang)/boss/decision maker/(market) leader (of companies)/front end of mud-flow/figurehead on prow of dragon boat 龍船|龙船
achievement/accomplishment/(in more recent usage) performance (of a business, employee etc)/results
extent of a rise (in prices etc)/amount of increase/growth (typically expressed as a percentage)
(of markets, industries, infectious diseases etc) rising/emerging/in the ascendant
Xinxing county in Yunfu 雲浮|云浮[Yun2 fu2], Guangdong/Xinxing or Hsinhsing district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
